APC OVERTURES: SHOULD AMAECHI TAKE THE BAIT?

“Amaechi has given Rivers people responsible leadership. The schools he has built will give Rivers children a better tomorrow while women and children stand to benefit from the standard health centers he has built. He has also carried out physical rehabilitation of infrastructures in the state. People like Amaechi should join the APC to move Nigeria forward’’
~ Gen. Muhammadu Buhari, APC Chieftain

"He has given Rivers people good education, given women and children quality health centers, built standard infrastructure.  We are in Rivers State to thank you for supporting Amaechi and also urge you to persuade your governor to join the APC"
~ Alhaji Ahmed Bola Tinubu , APC National Leader

“The instigators and perpetrators of the crisis in Rivers are keenly aware that they are running out of options. Their impeachment plan has been foiled by the take over of the legislative functions of the Rivers State House of Assembly’s functions by the  the National Assembly, while their plan to declare a state of emergency in the state has also failed, against the lack of support for such act by the National Assembly,”
~ Alhaji Lai Mohammed, APC National Publicity Secretary

"Short of totally surrendering on their demands, it is difficult to see how the G-7 can reach any agreement with a Presidency that has sacked ministers loyal to its members, locked up its members’ state liaison offices, sealed the personal property of its members, grounded its planes in order to thwart its national tours and went so far as to send a police DPO to stop its meeting.
"It is time for the G-7 to fish or cut bait. They cannot go on holding meetings and consulting elders forever. Except if they want to become the professional tour operators of Nigerian politics."
~ Candid Joe, Daily Trust Columnist

>>>
*Should Gov. Amaechi swith over to APC or remain in PDP?
*Could Gov. Amaechi to suffer persecution if he returns in PDP?
*Do you suport the view that Gov. Amechi's politicl future will suffer if he leaves PDP?
*Why have the mPDP (G-7) governors failed to switch, return or float a new party so far?
*Would you support it if APC gives Gov. Amaechi a Vice Presidential slot in 2015?
*If yes, who is likely to run with him as President?
*Way Forward...?
